privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.introduction: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
privacy_policy.data_collection:
- Account information (name, email, password).
- Transaction history for cashback tracking.
- Device and browser information for security purposes.
privacy_policy.data_usage:
- To provide and improve our cashback services.
- To process withdrawals securely.
- To personalize your experience and offer relevant promotions.
privacy_policy.data_sharing:
- We do not sell your data to third parties.
- We may share data with trusted partners for fraud prevention and analytics.
privacy_policy.your_rights:
- You can request access to your data.
- You can request deletion of your account and data.
- You can update or correct your personal details at any time.
privacy_policy.security:
- We use encryption and secure authentication.
- Unauthorized access attempts are monitored and prevented.
privacy_policy.changes:
- We may update this Privacy Policy periodically.
- You will be notified of any major changes.
privacy_policy.contact: If you have any questions, contact us at promodashcs@gmail.com.

terms_of_use.title: Terms of Use
terms_of_use.user_rights:
- Users must provide accurate and up-to-date information.
- Any fraudulent use of cashback is strictly prohibited.
- Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their accounts.
terms_of_use.cashback_usage:
- Cashback is credited according to store-specific conditions.
- Cashback may take up to 90 days for approval.
- Users can withdraw cashback once the minimum threshold is met.
terms_of_use.limitations:
- Multiple accounts per user are not allowed.
- Attempts to manipulate cashback tracking are strictly forbidden.
- Any violation of terms may result in account suspension.
terms_of_use.liability:
- We are not responsible for cashback tracking failures caused by external factors.
- We do not guarantee cashback approval by the stores.
terms_of_use.modifications:
- We reserve the right to update these terms at any time.
- Users will be notified of significant changes via email or app notifications.
terms_of_use.agreement: By using this app, you agree to these terms. If you have any questions, contact promodashcs@gmail.com.
